snippet: ROTHFELD--Betty R.,died July 15, peacefully as she slept, looking forward to her 95th birthday eleven days hence. She studied piano at Julliard, graduated from NYU, and served as a medical social worker at Bellevue and other New York hospitals. Sh...
lead_paragraph: ROTHFELD--Betty R.,died July 15, peacefully as she slept, looking forward to her 95th birthday eleven days hence. She studied piano at Julliard, graduated from NYU, and served as a medical social worker at Bellevue and other New York hospitals. She was an active community volunteer, founding in the early 1950s, the Manhasset, L.I., chapter of United Cerebral Palsy. A daughter of Dr. Abraham and Dr. Ella Feldman Rabiner, she was married for 66 years to the late Dr. Samuel H. Rothfeld. She is survived by her daughter Carolyn, sons Michael and Robert, six grandchildren and two great-grandchildren. Burial service private. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ROTHFELD, BETTY R.
